column5: Wife and I decided to fish for muskies today.Weather man said clear and sunny.Got on lake at 9 and off at 1:30.left rain gear at home (dumb)so 3 down pours later it turned nice again.Wore our life jackets to keep some rain off us.lol.Really didn't help much.Fishing was great muskie wise and my wife caufht 2 on the oldest lure i have.Go figure.I had 4 follows on a brand new lure but couldn't get them to take it 3xcept for one pike liked it.Fun day regardless of getting soaked 3 times.
